recipeList.directions: Directions: Heat the corn in a skillet until lightly browned. Remove from heat, top with cheese, and serve.

Bring a pot of salted water to a boil, add spaghetti and cook according to package directions. In a separate bowl, whisk together eggs, Parmesan cheese, milk, bacon, onions and garlic. Once the spaghetti is cooked, combine it with the egg mixture in the pan and mix together until the sauce thickens. Serve while hot.
recipeList.ingredients: Ingredients: 1lb spaghetti, 2 eggs, 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese, ½ cup milk, 4 pieces bacon, chopped onions and garlic.
